scripts.generate:icons: turbo run generate:icons --filter=@squaress/ui && pnpm run format
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'chore(release): release major %s' && npm run sync-versions && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: sync versions and updated package.json' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(release): release minor %s' && npm run sync-versions && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: sync versions and updated package.json' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(release): release patch %s' && npm run sync-versions && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: sync versions and updated package.json' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
